name: Paul Hawkins
description: I am very understanding,open minded with a heart of forgiving, loving and caring with sense of humor, hard working with cheerful character,honest,sincere,kind,warm and intelligent with good look, I’m open, sensual, kind, gentle, romantic… a different man,I’m a very family oriented, sensitive and tender person,I want to give all of my tenderness and care to my special woman. I have one wonderful daughter she is 9years old lives with my mom in England, I love her
